title: Tirta Empul Temple Purification (Half-day)
overview: Experience a traditional purification ritual at the sacred Tirta Empul Temple in central Bali.

stops.description: Arrive and participate in the purification ritual.
Explore the temple complex and holy springs.

title: Tirta Empul Temple & Ubud (Full-day)
overview: A full day of cultural immersion at Tirta Empul Temple and Ubud attractions.

stops.description: Arrive and participate in the purification ritual.
Explore the temple complex and holy springs.
Visit Ubud attractions such as the Monkey Forest or art market.
